extension.summary: Automatically resume playback even after abrupt shutdown.
extension.description: This service will automatically resume playback when XBMC starts. Even if the media was never stopped and XBMC was not shutdown (i.e. power was cut). This is a forked version based on the service.autoResume addon developed by gatorfreak. The main change is supporting resuming the next media file in the directory, using natural sorting for directory listing.
